pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.5: _Asambhinnena vilepanena_ is an unusual expression. Sp-ṭ 2.357: _Asambhinnenāti amakkhitena, anaṭṭhenāti attho_, “_Asambhinnena_: the meaning is ‘with (make-up) not smeared, not lost’.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.1.8: For an explanation of the renderings “bath powder” and “soap” for _cuṇṇa_ and _mattika_ respectively, see Appendix of Technical Terms.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.1.21: For a discussion of the _yojana_, see Measures in the Appendix of Technical Terms.
